title: If you could talk to one person in heaven who would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Boy, what a great question: it’s hard to answer though. I think it’s a toss-up between my Dad and my brother’s dog, Fudgie. When I was nine she had to be put down, she was in rough shape. I remember when we lost her, I knew that my heart would always have a hole where the love I felt for her used to live. Still that place is waiting to see her again!
Wernher von Braun - Wikipedia I want to get the complete scoop on what the rescued alien told him ;).
